sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SYMONDSBOROUGH, a remarkable large barrow of Flints, near Wellington in Devonſhire, in the northern extremity of Hemyock. The common people have a notion that a king called Symon was buried here. The tradition of the country plainly ſhows that it was the burial-place of ſome person or perſons of eminence.
